      主题: Help with Pro X Ultra Pedals  
      描述:  ﻿Hi,  
   
 I’m struggling with a few issues with my Pro X Ultra pedals: 
 
 
 
 
 Random dropping out of the VAM pro haptic reactors. The haptic reactors will ‘crash’ and continually vibrate unless I unplug the power and then reinsert the usb cable in that order. 
 The signal from the pedals ‘sticks’ at various inputs making it impossible to drive. 
 When calibrating in iRacing all signals are erratic (bouncing all over the place extremely fast), everything is like this even the wheel and shifter. As soon as I unplug the pedals this stops. 
 
 
 
 
 So far I have tried: 
 
 
65w powered USB hub with only the pedals connected
 
 
Pedals plugged directly into motherboard (2.0, 3.0 and 3.1 ports)
 
 
New control box from you guys (the resistor was incorrect in the previous one, the above problems are still there)
 
 
Earthing the rig
 
 
Earthing the pedals
 
 
Running with the haptic reactors unplugged
 
 
Disconnecting all other peripherals aside from pedals
 
 
Firmware updates
 
 
Software updates
 
 
Reinstalling Simsonn Manager
 
 
Recalibrating pedals
 
 
PC bios updates 
 
 Pc chipset updates 
 
USB drivers all reinstalled
 
 
Windows 11 up to date
 
 
The pc itself is a brand new high end build
 
 
 
 
 
 I have tried everything I have tried above and all three issues are present regardless. 
 
 
 
 The pedals are great when they’re working, but I can only get them working for a few minutes at a time before they stick, or the reactors crash. 
 
 
 
 Any help or suggestions would be greatly appreciated, I’m running out of ideas. 
   
 
My order number is #SSN2230. 
   
 Kind regards, Adam Shelton 
 M: 07585 110811

Hi Adam Shelton,  If this happens, it indicates that the computer’s grounding is not reliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used with a three-prong wall outlet. You can refer to the post below: connect the computer case to the stand, and connect the control box to the metal screws on the pedals. This should resolve the disconnection issue.  https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding

Hi,

Please get back to me on this, here’s a video of the eratic signals coming out of the clutch:

Simsonn pedals issues
https://youtu.be/i7o2hR85mz0

Kind regards,
Adam Shelton
M: 07585 110811

Hi Adam Shelton,  Please try again: first uninstall the local SIMSONN Manager, then download the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 from the official website. In the software, go to “Settings → Update → Manual Update” and select pedals‑firmware → pedals‑proxultra.sfu to update the firmware. After updating, test again and make sure the grounding connections are properly established.      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

It looks like they are bricked and I have no way of reinstalling the drivers. 

Honestly I am so frustrated with the software, the pedals are great in their physical form but everything is so janky.

What should I do now?

Kind regards,
Adam Shelton
